channel.title: A little help with PvPscapez 667/728 Release

item.title: A little help with PvPscapez 667/728 Release
item.dc:creator: @oujee oujee
item.description:
@oujee wrote:

i have a few problems with pvpscapez server first a grand exchange problem see the screen shot it works but when i close the buying interface and close ge i still have the search form in my chat window, how to fix that maybe a refresh or something should fix it i am noob with java, second i want to add a heal command, by default this server uses ::hit for random healed damage see the command used now

if (cmd[0].equalsIgnoreCase(“hit”)) {
for (int i = 0; i < 5; i++)
player.applyHit(new Hit(player, Utils.getRandom(3),
HitLook.HEALED_DAMAGE));
}
its random healed damage and heals so little damage arround 40 hp, i want to add something like this

if (command[0].equals(“heal”)) {
player.heal(1555);
player.getSkills().restorePray(120);
}
but this one always gets me error when compiling so if anyone pro can help to add that command that would be great, the last thing i need is a def editor i tried different ones but i couldn’t make it work

Read full topic
item.source: A little help with PvPscapez 667/728 Release
